title: Not Listed
description: This is a primer of names, numbers, and contact information for public affairs officers, think tanks, and defense contractors within the U.S. military. This document includes contact information for press desks, spokespeople, and other helpful contacts organized into sections including: Department of Defense, U.S. Air Force, U.S. Army, U.S. Marine Corps, U.S. Navy, U.S. Coast Guard, think tanks, and the author's contact information.
